example.eg: The doctor has to ignore the more minor injuries because so many people were hurt.
example.egtrans: 受伤的人太多，所以医生只能忽略那些受伤较轻的。

example.eg: That's a minor issue; there are more important things to think about.
example.egtrans: 那是次要的，还有更重要的问题需要思考呢。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 次要的, 比较不重要的

example.eg: The baseball player was successful in the minor leagues.
example.egtrans: 这位棒球球员在次级联赛中有出色的表现。

example.eg: The melody went down a minor step.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 小音阶的, 降调, 降半音

example.eg: Aaron was arrested for having sex with a minor.
example.egtrans: 艾伦因与未成年人发生性关系而遭到逮捕。

example.eg: Erin wasn't allowed to buy alcohol because she was still a minor.
example.egtrans: 艾琳还是未成年人，不能购买酒精。

example.eg: The minor girl's boyfriend was arrested.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不到允许性行为年龄的

example.eg: The bouncer kicked the minor boys out of the bar.
The pianist played a minor chord.
Tom sang the minor to Shaun's note.
Kelsey earned a minor in music.
Let's not get bogged down in minor details.
When I was in college, I majored in business and minored in psychology.
Fortunately, he only suffered minor injuries in the accident.
Many smaller cities in the US have minor league baseball teams comprised of players hoping to one day join the major leagues.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 小职业球队联盟, 小联赛

example.eg: I was upset, but my mother told me not to get so worked up over a minor matter.
He posited several minor premises to support his primary thesis.
His first film appearance was a minor role in Star Wars.
All the credit should go to you because I only played a minor role in winning this contract.
Surely masturbation must be a minor sin in relation to murder.
